General.Name: Bellevue Healthcare Trust PLC
General.Description: Bellevue Healthcare Trust plc is a closed ended equity mutual fund launched by Bellevue Asset Management AG. The fund is managed by Bellevue Advisors Limited. It invests in public equity markets across the globe. The fund seeks to invest in stocks of companies operating across healthcare sector. It seeks to benchmark the performance of its portfolio against the MSCI World Healthcare Index. Bellevue Healthcare Trust plc was formed on October 7, 2016 and is domiciled in the United Kingdom.
